newsitem.title: USA: John Hancock div income, capital gain.
newsitem.headline: John Hancock div income, capital gain.

text.p: John Hancock Bank & Thrift Opportunity Fund said on Tuesday that it will pay a dividend income and capital gain distribution.

The dividend income of $0.1186, short-term capital gain of $0.0032, long-term capital gain of $0.1297 amount to a $0.2515 total. The payment date is December 30 1996 for holders of record December 23, 1996.

The December 30, 1996 payment date will be the second distribution this year for John Hancock Bank & Thrift as earlier this year on October 23 there was a dividend and capital gain distribution of $1.60.
The company, a close-end fund, focuses primarily on small to medium size regional and thrift stocks in the United States.
